settings.title: Editor Settings
settings.fontFamilyHelper: You can specify multiple fonts separated by commas.
settings.debugModeDescriptionBeforeLink: Debug mode will output logs to

archived.title: Archived notes
archived.deleteAllDialogMessage: Delete all archived notes? This cannot be undone.

file.notFoundMessage: This file was moved or deleted. Keep the content as an unsaved buffer?
file.changedExternallyMessage: This file was modified outside the app. Reload? (Unsaved editor changes will be lost)
file.unsavedChangesMessage: Discard changes and close the file?
file.binaryOpenError: Cannot open: file appears to be binary
file.saveAsFailed: Save As failed — check permissions or try a different location
file.saveFailedKeepChanges: Save failed — changes still in editor

driveUI.signInFailedMessage:
Could not authenticate with Google. Please try again.

Details: {{error}}
driveUI.disconnectMessage: Syncing will stop. Your notes remain saved locally.
driveUI.syncFailedMessage:
Could not sync with Google Drive. Notes are safe locally.

Details: {{error}}

migration.title: Cloud Storage Update
migration.announcement:
Cloud storage has been updated to a new format.
(Using appDataFolder in Google Drive to avoid excessive file operation history output)

All devices must be running Monaco Notepad v1.3.0 or later. Devices running older versions will not be able to sync with Monaco Notepad v1.3.0 or later.

sync.firstPush: First sync: Uploading local notes to Google Drive...
sync.pushLocalChanges: Uploading local changes to Google Drive...
sync.conflictDetected: Syncing: Changes detected on both local and cloud
sync.removeLocalDeleted: Removing local note "{{noteId}}" (deleted on another device)...

drive.noteAlreadyAbsent: Note "{{noteId}}" already absent on Drive. Treating as deleted.
drive.noteMissingRemoveList: Note "{{noteId}}" missing in Drive files. Removing from cloud note list.
drive.noteMissingUploadLocal: Note "{{noteId}}" missing in Drive files. Uploading local copy.

conflict.keepLocal: Note "{{noteId}}" edited on both devices — keeping local (newer)
conflict.keepCloud: Note "{{noteId}}" edited on both devices — keeping cloud (newer)

drive.deferNoteListUpload: Local changes arrived during push; deferring note list upload to next sync
drive.deferCloudApply: Local changes arrived during pull; deferring cloud apply to next sync
drive.deferConflictMerge: Local changes arrived during conflict resolution; deferring local merge to next sync
drive.partialPushDeferred: Partial push deferred; keeping local dirty state for retry ({{uploadFailures}} upload/update failed, {{deleteFailures}} delete failed)
drive.partialConflictDeferred: Partial conflict resolution deferred; keeping local dirty state for retry ({{uploadFailures}} upload/download failed, {{deleteFailures}} delete failed)
drive.noteListCorrupted: Note list corrupted. Using last known good state.

migration.alreadyDone: Storage already migrated from another device

error.getNoteListMeta: Failed to get note list metadata
error.getUpdatedMeta: Failed to get updated metadata after push
error.repairCloudList: Failed to repair cloud note list after missing note cleanup
error.loadLocalForConflict: Failed to load local note "{{noteId}}" for conflict resolution
error.listNotesFolder: Failed to list files in notes folder
error.getChangeToken: Failed to get change token. Falling back to full sync.
error.changesAPI: Changes API failed. Falling back to full sync.
error.checkNoteListFile: Failed to check note list file

system.integrityAutoRepaired: Integrity check: auto-repaired local data ({{count}} changes)

orphan.cloudRecoveryDone: Recovered {{count}} orphan cloud notes into "{{folder}}" folder
orphan.recoveryDialogLocal: {{count}} orphan note(s) found on local disk were recovered into the "{{folder}}" folder.
orphan.recoveryDialogCloud: {{count}} orphan note(s) found on Google Drive were recovered into the "{{folder}}" folder.
orphan.recoveryDialogCloudDeleted: {{count}} duplicate conflict copy/copies were deleted from Google Drive.
